name: SFS Kids
description: SFSKids.org is a free interactive educational website, designed to support learning about all aspects of orchestral music. This site is offered to teachers and schools as an optional resource, and as a way to extend AIM learning. The site can be accessed through any computer, laptop, or mobile device. SFSKids.org is geared to elementary-age children and beyond, sure to delight users of all ages. The site contains six interactive modules and loads of audio clips of music performed by the San Fran
